These are the branding opportunities at overhead baggage storage compartments

mediaOption6.description:
Ads can be placed on the 162-168 trays which are behind passenger
 seat and visible when trays are in upright position. One can use multiple creatives.

mediaOption5.description:
Upon taking off or landing
,the crew members will deliver a specific announcement about the brand to passengers.This can be destination
 specific and works well for restaurant chains,retail 
  outlets etc.

mediaOption4.description: Product samples are distributed to the people inside the aircraft

mediaOption3.description:
A full page

  food & beverage in flight
 as well as browse the AirAsia merchandise section.

mediaOption2.description:
Also known as RH Partition,this is the large
 partition at the entrance of the aircraft which all passengers face while
 seated. This medium especially
 targets the Premium Seat customers over the first five rows that pay a premium for their seats and their
 flying experience.

Tarmac coaches ply between the terminal and the airline carrying
 passengers who want to board and off board. These coaches have the branding options on inside panels
 and grab handles. There are around 8 panel and 25-30 grabhandles per coach.
